issue.title: [C++] Provide CMake targets to test only within a given label
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8014](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8014). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Tests are labelled but this feature is not easily accessible from Ninja or Make. Provide targets like `test-label-arrow_dataset` which exercises only the tests labelled `arrow_dataset`.
